In this work, cross-sections ( σ
ax ) from Scofield are used and IMFPs ( λ
IMFP ) are obtained from the program SESSA using the TPP-2M formula
46, 47 . A custom PYTHON code was used to first carry out a normalisation of the data using the analyser transmission function and then a standardised Shirley background subtraction was performed, followed by an integration of the peak intensity I. In this way, the stoichiometric content of Cs and K were calculated for the photocathodes presented in this work.
